displayName: Ensure 'Trustworthy' Database Property is set to 'Off'
rationale: Provides protection from malicious CLR assemblies or extended procedures.
recommended_action:
Execute the following T-SQL statement against the databases (replace _`<database_name>`_ below) returned by the Audit Procedure:
```
ALTER DATABASE [<database_name>] SET TRUSTWORTHY OFF;
```
error_message: One or more databases has 'Trustworthy' database property set to 'On'
ruleNames: Ensure 'Trustworthy' Database Property is set to 'Off'
